mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_title , notice_information, notice_description , notice_writer) VALUES(#{notice_title}, #{notice_information}, #{notice_description}, #{notice_writer})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT notice_id AS prev_id, notice_title AS prev_title FROM notice WHERE notice_id < #{notice_id} ORDER BY notice_id DESC LIMIT 1) a ON 1=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT notice_id AS next_id, notice_title AS next_title FROM notice WHERE notice_id > #{notice_id} ORDER BY notice_id ASC LIMIT 1) b ON 1=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_image AS i ON i.notice_id = #{notice_id} WHERE n.notice_id = #{notice_id}
SELECT * FROM notice AS n LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_image AS i ON i.notice_id = n.notice_id AND i.notice_id>0 WHERE n.notice_id > 0 ORDER BY n.notice_id DESC LIMIT #{pageStart},#{amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM notice WHERE notice_id>0
